title: Where You Land In The NFL Matters
itunes:title: Where You Land In The NFL Matters
description:
In this edition of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, he tells you why it's undeniable that some NFL quarterbacks are drafted onto teams with stacked rosters and, not surprisingly, do better than those drafted to teams with less surrounding help, Mike McCarthy is a much better coach than the media gave him credit for when he coached Aaron Rodgers in Green Bay, Mike Gundy's behavior is not surprising to Colin and don't flush Bill O'Brien's head coaching prowess. Guests include: Ryen Russillo, Joel Klatt, Albert Breer, James Conner and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
